data.name: CARD_EDIT_RESIZE_DESCRIPTION
data.value:
The image will be resized to the selected size, you can use this option to make the overall file size of the learning module smaller and/or make the images fit better to the size of the learning window.
To deactivate or modify resizing for cards added later, click the resize button again and select the desired sizing.
